UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public profile information.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

bio.description: A short bio about the user.

gymCoordinates.description: The user's saved gym location coordinates.

city.description: The user's city for location-based matching.

usualGymTime.description: The user's usual workout time window.

attendance.description: A map of dates the user attended the gym.

streakCount.description: The user's current gym attendance streak.

lastCheckInDate.description: The last date the user checked in.

ProgressMetrics.title: Progress Metrics
ProgressMetrics.description: Represents a user's trackable fitness metrics.

weeklyChange.description: Percentage change in volume from last week

Swipe.title: Swipe
Swipe.description: Represents a user's swipe action on another user.

swiperId.description: The ID of the user who swiped.

targetId.description: The ID of the user who was swiped on.

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents a mutual match between two users.

users.description: Array containing the UIDs of the two matched users.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a chat conversation between two matched users.

users.description: Array containing the UIDs of the two users in the conversation.

lastMessage.description: The text of the last message sent.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within a conversation.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who sent the message.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

matchId.description: The ID of the match associated with the notification.

senderId.description: The UID of the user who triggered the notification.

senderName.description: The name of the user who triggered the notification.

senderPhoto.description: The photo URL of the user who triggered the notification.

timestamp.description: The time the notification was created.

/users/{userId}/progress/metrics.description: Stores a user's editable progress metrics.

/swipes/{swipeId}.description: Stores individual swipe actions. Write-only for clients.

/matches/{matchId}.description: Stores mutual matches. Read-only for clients, created by server.

/conversations/{matchId}.description: Stores conversation metadata. Readable/writable by participants.

/conversations/{matchId}/messages/{messa.description: Sub-collection for messages within a conversation.

/notifications/{userId}/user_notificatio.description: Stores notifications for a specific user.
